scripts.build: cp -rf lib build && cp -rf web/src build/web/src && cp -f lib/ash.d.ts build/ash.d.ts && cp -f web/favicon.png build/web/favicon.png && cp -f web/index.html build/web/index.html && cp -f web/example_build.html build/web/example.html && cp -f web/main.js build/web/main.js && cat lib/prolog.coffee LF lib/signals/ListenerNode.coffee LF lib/signals/ListenerNodePool.coffee LF lib/signals/SignalBase.coffee LF lib/signals/Signal0.coffee LF lib/signals/Signal1.coffee LF lib/signals/Signal2.coffee LF lib/signals/Signal3.coffee LF lib/core/Entity.coffee LF lib/core/EntityList.coffee LF lib/core/Node.coffee LF lib/core/NodeList.coffee LF lib/core/NodePool.coffee LF lib/core/System.coffee LF lib/core/SystemList.coffee LF lib/core/Family.coffee LF lib/core/ComponentMatchingFamily.coffee LF lib/core/Engine.coffee LF lib/ext/Dictionary.coffee LF lib/ext/Helper.coffee LF lib/ext/Util.coffee LF lib/fsm/ComponentInstanceProvider.coffee LF lib/fsm/ComponentSingletonProvider.coffee LF lib/fsm/ComponentTypeProvider.coffee LF lib/fsm/DynamicComponentProvider.coffee LF lib/fsm/DynamicSystemProvider.coffee LF lib/fsm/EngineState.coffee LF lib/fsm/StateComponentMapping.coffee LF lib/fsm/EngineStateMachine.coffee LF lib/fsm/EntityState.coffee LF lib/fsm/EntityStateMachine.coffee LF lib/fsm/StateSystemMapping.coffee LF lib/fsm/SystemInstanceProvider.coffee LF lib/fsm/SystemSingletonProvider.coffee LF lib/tick/FrameTickProvider.coffee LF lib/tools/ComponentPool.coffee LF lib/tools/ListIteratingSystem.coffee | coffee -cs > build/ash.coffee.js && cat lib/prolog.coffee LF lib/signals/ListenerNode.coffee LF lib/signals/ListenerNodePool.coffee LF lib/signals/SignalBase.coffee LF lib/signals/Signal0.coffee LF lib/signals/Signal1.coffee LF lib/signals/Signal2.coffee LF lib/signals/Signal3.coffee LF lib/core/Entity.coffee LF lib/core/EntityList.coffee LF lib/core/Node.coffee LF lib/core/NodeList.coffee LF lib/core/NodePool.coffee LF lib/core/System.coffee LF lib/core/SystemList.coffee LF lib/core/Family.coffee LF lib/core/ComponentMatchingFamily.coffee LF lib/core/Engine.coffee LF lib/ext/Dictionary.coffee LF lib/ext/Helper.coffee LF lib/ext/Util.coffee LF lib/fsm/ComponentInstanceProvider.coffee LF lib/fsm/ComponentSingletonProvider.coffee LF lib/fsm/ComponentTypeProvider.coffee LF lib/fsm/DynamicComponentProvider.coffee LF lib/fsm/DynamicSystemProvider.coffee LF lib/fsm/EngineState.coffee LF lib/fsm/StateComponentMapping.coffee LF lib/fsm/EngineStateMachine.coffee LF lib/fsm/EntityState.coffee LF lib/fsm/EntityStateMachine.coffee LF lib/fsm/StateSystemMapping.coffee LF lib/fsm/SystemInstanceProvider.coffee LF lib/fsm/SystemSingletonProvider.coffee LF lib/tick/FrameTickProvider.coffee LF lib/tools/ComponentPool.coffee LF lib/tools/ListIteratingSystem.coffee | coffee -cs | java -jar packages/closure-compiler/lib/vendor/compiler.jar --compilation_level WHITESPACE_ONLY --js_output_file build/ash.coffee.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf build/* && mkdir build/web && mkdir build/lib
scripts.deploy: cp -rf web/res web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -rf web/src web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -f web/main.js web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -f web/project.json web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets
scripts.folder: mkdir build/web && mkdir build/lib && cp -fr lib/src build/lib && cp -fr web/res build/web
scripts.preandroid: npm run predeploy && npm run transpile && npm run resources && cp -fr web/res ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean -s && npm run transpile && npm run resources && npm run folders
scripts.transpile: coffee -o web/src/ash -cm lib && coffee -o web/src/example -cm example
